channel.title: 120 in all non combat skills... custom content?
channel.description:
[center][size=10pt]So me and Java-Rsps-Noob have started a little project together and I have implemented new skill capes which you can obtain when you reach 120 in a select skill... (combat skills wont be included and 120 str boosted with an ovl would be too op and stupid) So we were wondering if anyone had any ideas on some custom skilling content we could implement to.
Number 1: Balance the Xp rate, so it doesn't feel like a grind to get 120 in a skill. Number 2: To make our server more enjoyable and more unique than other servers.
Thank you for your time [/size][/center]

item.title: 120 in all non combat skills... custom content?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“Java-RSPS-Noob, post:13, topic:525469”]Vain mind elaborating more? How does this affect the character standing/other indexes while performing the animations?[/quote]correction. i meant gfx. the animations can be triggered at different times to ‘cycle’ through correctly. but gfx can be overlapped.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“Tutorial, post:10, topic:525469”][quote author=Fire capez link=topic=644211.msg4335253#msg4335253 date=1374249014]
how about making a new spell book and a quest to supplement it??
[/quote]
This would require new spells, animations, and story line to support it.[/quote]you can overlap previous animations to make custom ones.

item.title: 120 in all non combat skills... custom content?
item.dc:creator: @Its_Just_Frost Its Just Frost
item.description:
@Its_Just_Frost wrote:

[quote=“Java-RSPS-Noob, post:6, topic:525469”][quote author=Its Just Frost link=topic=644211.msg4335208#msg4335208 date=1374242579]
For mining we could recolor rune ore red… facepalm
and for smithing we could recolor rune bars red facepalm
then… we could make Dragon armor!!! ! yay facepalm

Just throwing some ideas out there lol…
[/quote]As much as I like the whole dragon armor smithing content (which is quite easy mind you ) it has been done 2-3 times already so I’d rather find something else keep them coming![/quote]

Tht was a joke btw I’m still thinking

Read full topic

item.source: 120 in all non combat skills... custom content?

item.title: 120 in all non combat skills... custom content?
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

I already have a partially completed Agility class which includes Ape atoll/werewolf. I was thinking about making those be more spread out skill requirement wise and having obstacle requirements of course.

I was considering flask making for herblore for higher skilling levels.

The other skills though…hmm not sure.

Edit: obviously higher mining level for the “red stone” for the flasks I’d still like to get at least one more mining content piece as well something different than other servers!

Read full topic
item.source: 120 in all non combat skills... custom content?

item.title: 120 in all non combat skills... custom content?
item.dc:creator: @Its_Just_Frost Its Just Frost
item.description:
@Its_Just_Frost wrote:

[quote=“Fire capez, post:2, topic:525469”]you could use the construct map packet to make locations for newer features such as an agility course, it’s not difficult to edit the properties of objects. really if you want to expand game content unless it’s going to be half assed you should write a set of utilities (map editor, npc editor, etc)

as for experience rates make it ridiculously difficult to get to level 120 (like 10x the amount of level 99) so people will have a lot of work to do - this gives you more time to add newer content and the levels in-between 99-120 shouldn’t effect the combat too much.[/quote]

Thanks for this and yeah it would take 104 million xp to get to level 120 and combat wise were not going to make them level to 120 were going to keep them at level 99.

And as this is a pk/eco server were making we decided that adding new skilling content would allow us a larger playerbase

Read full topic
item.source: 120 in all non combat skills... custom content?

item.title: 120 in all non combat skills... custom content?
item.dc:creator: @Fire_capez Fire capez
item.description:
@Fire_capez wrote:

you could use the construct map packet to make locations for newer features such as an agility course, it’s not difficult to edit the properties of objects. really if you want to expand game content unless it’s going to be half assed you should write a set of utilities (map editor, npc editor, etc)

as for experience rates make it ridiculously difficult to get to level 120 (like 10x the amount of level 99) so people will have a lot of work to do - this gives you more time to add newer content and the levels in-between 99-120 shouldn’t effect the combat too much.

Read full topic

Number 1: Balance the Xp rate, so it doesn’t feel like a grind to get 120 in a skill.
Number 2: To make our server more enjoyable and more unique than other servers.

Thank you for your time
